amendment.description: An amendment numbered 85 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used for environmental justice activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 204 (Roll no. 397).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 204 (Roll no. 397).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
